scripts.build-test-programs: pnpm build-test-account-compression && pnpm build-test-compressed-pda && pnpm build-test-compressed-token && pnpm build-test-registry && pnpm build-program-owned-account-test
scripts.test: pnpm test-account-compression && pnpm test-compressed-pda && pnpm test-compressed-token && pnpm test-registry
scripts.test-account-compression: pnpm build-test-account-compression && RUST_MIN_STACK=8388608 cargo test-sbf -p account-compression -- --test-threads 1
scripts.test-compressed-pda: pnpm build-test-compressed-pda && RUST_MIN_STACK=8388608 cargo test-sbf -p light-compressed-pda -- --test-threads 1
scripts.test-compressed-token: pnpm build-test-compressed-token && RUST_MIN_STACK=8388608 cargo test-sbf -p light-compressed-token -- --test-threads 1
scripts.test-registry: pnpm build-test-registry && cd registry && cargo test-sbf -- --test-threads 1
